sub_title: Associate Facilities Planning and Management Officer at Asian Development Bank (ADB)
summary:
15 years cumulative experience in GCC, under Project / Construction Management and Construction supervision; to deliver significant National projects such as Doha Metro – Major Stations, Qatar National Museum, National Theatre of Bahrain; which indents a legacy in a country’s identity and culture.  
 
These attributes from exposure with notable architectural projects, and able to emulate with passion and commitment; to deliver with strict and sensible compliance with high quality Architectural workmanship (finishes), technical insights in Architectural Branding Design and Project deliverable. And encourages innovation to further grow and develop, in my pursuit being a chief builder.
